name: Dr Martens Jadon Flatform Chunky Boots

brand: Dr Martens' boots and shoes define generations of rebel style and anti-fashion. With yellow welt stitching and an air-cushioned sole, each pair is chunky, durable and comfortable. Go for its iconic leather boots to complete just about any look, or stamp your individuality through bright colours and textured finishes. Strap yourself into its sandals for sunny toes-out days.

name: TOMS classic canvas flat shoes in black
productDetails: Canvas upper Elastic v-stitch for easy on and off Cushioned comfort insole Arch insert for added support Durable one-piece outsole With every pair of shoes purchased, Toms give a pair of new shoes to a child. One for one.
brand: Pioneer of the �One for One� project through which millions of pairs of shoes were gifted to children who needed them, TOMS has been creating footwear since 2006. Always striving to do more, the brand now donates �1 for every �3 it makes to organisations that support safety, mental health and equal opportunity. Look out for its printed espadrilles, slip-on canvas shoes and leather trainers, all available in our TOMS at ASOS edit.

name: TOMS classic canvas flat shoes in navy
productDetails: Canvas upper Elasticated insert Cushioned comfort insole Arch insert for added support Woven one-piece midsole With every pair of shoes purchased, Toms give a pair of new shoes to a child. One for one
brand: During a trip to Argentina in 2006 American Traveller Blake Mycoskie befriended children in Argentina and found they had no shoes to protect their feet. Borne out of a desire to help the children he met, he created Toms a footwear brand that would match every pair of shoes purchased with a pair of new shoes given to a child in need. One for One.
